title: Welcome — What This Is All About
excerpt: I'm starting this blog to document my journey as an investor — the research, the process, and the lessons along the way.
body:
I'm starting this blog as a public log of my investing journey. The idea is simple: document my research, my process, and my thinking as I learn and grow as an investor.

I want a place where I can look back and see how my ideas evolved over time — what I got right, what I got wrong, and why. Having a record of your own decision-making is one of the most underrated tools in investing.

But this isn't just for me. I'm putting it out in the open because I believe in learning out loud. If you're on a similar path, I'd love to hear from you — whether that's collaboration, questions, advice, or just a different perspective. The best ideas come from honest conversation.

More posts coming soon. Stay tuned.
